name: Fayyaz ul Amir Afsar Minhas
content: Fayyaz MinhasSearch this siteEmbedded FilesSkip to main contentSkip to navigationWelcome!Fayyaz-ul-Amir Afsar MinhasHello, and Welcome to my research and teaching profile!I am an associate professor of AI in biomedicine at Warwick Computer Science. My primary area of research is machine learning in bioinformatics and computational pathology. I am affiliated with the PathLAKE Center of Excellence as well as the Tissue Image Analytics (TIA) Centre .Warwick PagePublicationsSoftwareCoursesHonors and AwardsBiography and CVProspective Students: I am looking for new graduate students. If you are interested, you can contact me at: fayyaz dot minhas at Warwick dot ac dot UK! Highlights:Stopping CRISPR with Machine Learning - Invited talk at the warwick health global research priorities webinar , Dec. 4, 2020."TIA, PathLAKE en daarbuiten" (TIA, PathLAKE and Beyond) by Fayyaz Minhas, Seminar Digitale Pathologie: Onderweg naar Computational Pathology en Ai, 26 May 2021.Invited talk on "Whole Slide Images are Graphs" at the 7th Digital Pathology and AI congress (Dec 3, 2020)A short tutorial on Solving the cat and mouse puzzle with reinforcement learningVideo presentation in IJCNN/WCCI 2020 on Generalized Neural Framework For Learning With Rejection Video presentation in CVPR 2020 on Capturing Cellular Topology in Multigigapixel histopathology imagesVideo presentation in CVPR 2020 on Cross-Domain Knowledge Transfer for Prediction of Chemosensitivity in Ovarian Cancer PatientsGoogle SitesReport abusePage detailsPage updated Google SitesReport abuse
